about_the_game:
In the 'Terror Forest' series a catastrophic nuclear event has caused a mass exodus from the surrounding area. However, not everyone left and many of those who stayed behind have taken advantage of the lawlessness that's afforded them space to commit horrific acts. In the Terror Forest: Hell House episode DLC, make your way through an abandoned house that an evil being is using to conduct torture and grotesque human experiments.

You can also control the warp camera to manually jump from place to place in the scene or use the slideshow setting and they'll cycle through automatically.

Note: This episode contains significant blood and gore, and themes of human torture. Not recommended for younger audiences. (16+ recommended)

*This episode currently features Ambiance Mode only and does not include a hidden objects game. It does include a short secret items game.*

This episode is part of the Ambient Channels: Collectors Expansion 2020/2021

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC includes horrific scenes depicting torture and violence.  It has blood, gore and human body parts incorporated.  The user is not a focus of the violence, but does interact with it to play the hidden objects game.  The result of the violence is shown, but the violence itself is not.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or AMD R7 250x
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650Ti or AMD R7 260

short_description: In the 'Terror Forest' series, a catastrophic nuclear event has caused a mass exodus from the surrounding area. In the 'Hell House' episode you come upon an abandoned house that's been reclaimed for use by an evil being to conduct torture and grotesque human experiments.
